import pandas as pd

base={'NY.GDP.PCAP.PP.KD' : [ 30647.82576, 31093.86556, 31441.98181, 31018.14406, 31920.56074, 32613.41253, 33068.39712, 34212.48173, 34813.85524, 35971.85194, 37188.63945, 37361.71791, 37856.86017, 37990.64819, 39201.5252, 39802.96753, 40532.26826, 41623.43788, 41619.3301, 40355.56471, 41085.9175, 41284.15101, 41125.24116, 41013.99211, 41344.63628, 41820.82683, 42214.02461, 42781.05782, 43217.95224], 'Date' : [ 1990, 1991, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018]}
base=pd.DataFrame(base)
print(base)


base=pd.DataFrame(base)
print(base['NY.GDP.PCAP.PP.KD'].mean())
